output:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: pg-backup-s3
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
type: Opaque
stringData:
  AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: "AKIAEXAMPLEID1234"
  AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: "REDACTED-SECRET-KEY"
  AWS_REGION: "us-east-1"
---
apiVersion: postgresql.cnpg.io/v1beta1
kind: Cluster
metadata:
  name: pg-prod
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
spec:
  instances: 3
  affinity:
    enablePodAntiAffinity: true
  enableSuperuserAccess: false
  minSyncReplicas: 1
  maxSyncReplicas: 1
  primaryUpdateMethod: switchover
  postgresql:
    parameters:
      shared_buffers: "512MB"
      max_connections: "200"
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: "1000m"
      memory: "2Gi"
    limits:
      cpu: "2"
      memory: "4Gi"
  storage:
    size: "100Gi"
    storageClass: "standard"
  bootstrap:
    initdb:
      database: appdb
      owner: appuser
  backup:
    target: prefer-standby
    barmanObjectStore:
      destinationPath: "s3://my-bucket/pg/pg-prod"
      s3Credentials:
        accessKeyId:
          name: pg-backup-s3
          key: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
        secretAccessKey:
          name: pg-backup-s3
          key: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
        region:
          name: pg-backup-s3
          key: AWS_REGION
      data:
        encryption: AES256
        compression: gzip
      wal:
        compression: gzip
    retentionPolicy: "30d"
---
apiVersion: postgresql.cnpg.io/v1beta1
kind: Pooler
metadata:
  name: pg-prod-pgbouncer
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
spec:
  cluster:
    name: pg-prod
  instances: 2
  type: rw
  pgbouncer:
    poolMode: transaction
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: pg-prod-pgbouncer-svc
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  selector:
    cnpg.io/cluster: pg-prod
    cnpg.io/poolerName: pg-prod-pgbouncer
  ports:
    - name: postgres
      port: 5432
      targetPort: 5432
---
apiVersion: postgresql.cnpg.io/v1beta1
kind: ScheduledBackup
metadata:
  name: pg-prod-daily-0200
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
spec:
  cluster:
    name: pg-prod
  schedule: "0 2 * * *"
  backupOwnerReference: cluster
  target: prefer-standby
---
apiVersion: postgresql.cnpg.io/v1beta1
kind: Backup
metadata:
  name: pg-prod-initial
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
spec:
  cluster:
    name: pg-prod
  target: prefer-standby
---
apiVersion: policy/v1
kind: PodDisruptionBudget
metadata:
  name: pg-prod-pdb
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
spec:
  minAvailable: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      cnpg.io/cluster: pg-prod
---
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: pg-prod-db-ingress-allowlist
  namespace: default
  labels:
    dot-ai.io/managed: "true"
    dot-ai.io/app-name: pg-prod
    dot-ai.io/intent: deploy-postgresql-database
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      cnpg.io/cluster: pg-prod
  policyTypes:
    - Ingress
  ingress:
    - from:
        - namespaceSelector:
            matchLabels:
              kubernetes.io/metadata.name: default
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 5432
